XMLSerializer.summary: The XMLSerializer interface provides the method to construct an XML string representing a {{Glossary("DOM")}} tree.

blockquote.para: The resulting XML string is not guaranteed to be well-formed XML.

XMLSerializerSerializeToString.summary:
The method
serializeToString() constructs a string representing the
specified DOM tree in XML form.

remarks.para:
-Parsing and serializing XML
-Serializing to HTML: and
-Parsing HTML or XML to create a DOM tree:

XMLSerializerSerializeToString.returns: A string containing the XML representation of the specified DOM tree.
